medium: I notice the stress but try to keep calm, consult one or two colleagues, and work together to identify the best approach.
moderately_low: I experience minimal stress and just rally the team together quickly to brainstorm possible solutions.
low: I remain calm, confident that the group can handle the situation, and focus on staying positive with the team.
